document.full_text: american league mvp josh hamilton will be side lined for up to eight weeks after breaking a bone in his arm during the texas rangers' 5-4 loss to the detroit tigers on tuesday.
document.title: texas slugger hamilton breaks arm, to miss up to eight weeks
lines_and_colors: american league mvp josh hamilton will be side lined for up to eight weeks after breaking a bone in his arm during the texas rangers' 5-4 loss to the detroit tigers on tuesday.
